amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to strengthening the national do-not-call registry.

vote.text: Amendment SA 993 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 993 proposed by Senator Sanders for Senator Menendez.
